---
title: "Knot tying learning objectives"
output: 
  html_document:
    self_contained: FALSE
css: style.css
---

Students will be able to tie the following knots in an application similar to those listed (instructional videos provided below):

* Bowline (attach a line to an anchor)
* Half hitch (secure a knot)
* Lobster buoy hitch (secure a line to a buoy)
